article_title: Obama catches fainting woman during Obamacare rally — Opinion — Bangor Daily News — BDN Maine
article_text:
Today President Barack Obama held a rally at the White House for the Affordable Care Act. Toward the end of his speech, he appears to catch a woman — an Obamacare enrollee — on the verge of fainting. “This happens when I talk too long,” Obama quipped.

The woman tweeted afterward she began fainting because she is pregnant and diabetic. She thanked the president for catching her.

article_summary:
Today President Barack Obama held a rally at the White House for the Affordable Care Act.
Toward the end of his speech, he appears to catch a woman — an Obamacare enrollee — on the verge of fainting.
The woman tweeted afterward she began fainting because she is pregnant and diabetic.
She thanked the president for catching her.
“This happens when I talk too long,” Obama quipped.
